thread.title: Clean and good hotel
thread.title_full: Clean and good hotel - Review of Crosti Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ecneics03
title: Clean and good hotel
text:
It is a surprise to us that this hotel is so nice and new. The hotel offered nice breakfast. The room is very comfortable and clean. Toilet is new and clean. The staffs are very friendly and helpful. Recommended very nice restaurants for us to have good dinner.
Room Tip: Very new and clean hotel See more room tips
